io.proximax.core.crypto

Class Cipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.proximax.core.crypto.Cipher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BlockCipher

    public class Cipher
extends java.lang.Object
implements BlockCipher
    Wraps IES encryption and decryption logic.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cipher

        public Cipher(KeyPair senderKeyPair,
              KeyPair recipientKeyPair)
        Creates a cipher around a sender KeyPair and recipient KeyPair.
        Parameters:
        senderKeyPair - The sender KeyPair. The sender's private key is required for encryption.
        recipientKeyPair - The recipient KeyPair. The recipient's private key is required for decryption.

      • Cipher

        public Cipher(KeyPair senderKeyPair,
              KeyPair recipientKeyPair,
              CryptoEngine engine)
        Creates a cipher around a sender KeyPair and recipient KeyPair.
        Parameters:
        senderKeyPair - The sender KeyPair. The sender's private key is required for encryption.
        recipientKeyPair - The recipient KeyPair. The recipient's private key is required for decryption.
        engine - The crypto engine.

        public Cipher(BlockCipher cipher)
        Creates a cipher around a cipher.
        Parameters:
        cipher - The cipher.

        Encrypts an arbitrarily-sized message.

        Parameters:

      • decrypt

        public byte[] decrypt(byte[] input)
        Description copied from interface: BlockCipher
        Decrypts an arbitrarily-sized message.
        Specified by:
        decrypt in interface BlockCipher
        Parameters:
        input - The message to decrypt.
        Returns:
